segments.text: Can I help you find something ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would like to buy a new fridge .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is there one in particular that you like ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I was looking at this Kenmore refrigerator .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ah yes , that is a great refrigerator .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's both affordable and it comes with all the appliances .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It comes with an ice maker , water dispenser , and there is a lot of room inside .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: May I see the inside for myself ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow ! You're right ! This refrigerator is great . I'll take it .
segments.speaker: S2
